original_text: It is the same at this time too. There is a small number of Israel's people that God has chosen to trust him. He has chosen them because he is very kind.
korean_text: 그런즉 이와 같이 지금도 은혜로 택하심을 따라 남은 자가 있느니라

sentences.original_text: It is the same at this time too.
There is a small number of Israel's people
that God has chosen to trust him.
He has chosen them because he is very kind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매우 자비로우시기 때문에 그들을 선택했습니다.
